I am a PhD student working for Ifremer and Institut Agro (Rennes). I'm finishing my last year of PhD. I am mainly specialized in fisheries science, quantitative ecology and statistical modelling. I actually develop methods for understanding how exploited fish populations are distributed in space and time. You'll find plenty of details in the following pages!
